Class: News¶

async compass.news.get([start][, limit])¶
Arguments:
  • start (number) – The article number to start fetching at. Defaults to 0.
  • limit (number) – The number of articles to fetch. Will fetch up to and equal to this number of articles. Defaults to 10.
Returns:

NewsItem[]
